original_text: All the time, they praised God. All the other people thought that the believers were good people. Every day, the Lord saved more people so that the group of believers grew bigger.
korean_text: 하나님을 찬미하며 또 온 백성에게 칭송을 받으니 주께서 구원 받는 사람을 날마다 더하게 하시니라

sentences.original_text: All the time, they praised God.
that the believers were good people.
Every day, the Lord saved more people
sentences.korean_translation: 매일 주님께서 더 많은 사람들을 구원하셨습니다

sentences.original_text: so that the group of believers grew bigger.
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 믿는 사람들의 그룹이 더 커졌습니다.
